author: jta
msg: DERBY-2275 Improves DITA rendering of the PDF docs.
1) Previously the header had the word "Copyright" and nothing more. This
patch replaces "Copyright" with the title of the book.
2) Adds the Derby version to the table of contents.

author: eross
msg: Bug 41476 - Address issues found by "findbugs" static analysis tool
These include incorrect locking, forgetting to close streams, unused variables, etc.
